mapper.update: UPDATE RECEIPT SET prchDate = #{receiptData.date}, abstr = #{receiptData.abs}, placePymnt = #{receiptData.expendDepartment}, bdgtAmnt = #{receiptData.budgetAmt}, pymntAmnt = #{receiptData.paymentAmt}, prjtNm = #{receiptData.projectNm}, rmks = #{receiptData.etc}, regID = #{receiptData.regID} WHERE rcptNo = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT prchDate AS date, abstr AS abs, placePymnt AS expendDepartment, bdgtAmnt AS budgetAmt, pymntAmnt AS paymentAmt, prjtNm AS projectNm, rmks AS etc, regID AS regID FROM RECEIPT WHERE rcptNo = #{rcptNo}
SELECT YEAR(prchDate) AS year, MONTH(prchDate) AS month, COUNT(*) AS count FROM RECEIPT WHERE regID = #{uuid} GROUP BY YEAR(prchDate), MONTH(prchDate) ORDER BY year DESC, month DESC;

SELECT prchDate AS date, abstr AS abs, placePymnt AS expendDepartment, bdgtAmnt AS budgetAmt, pymntAmnt AS paymentAmt, prjtNm AS projectNm, rmks AS etc, regID AS regID FROM RECEIPT WHERE regID = #{uuid} AND prchDate BETWEEN #{startOfMonth} AND #{endOfMonth};
